snippet.title: The Last Grape - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: The Last Grape is a game about fruits, vegetables and vengeance. Check out The Last Grape trailer to see gameplay, dangerous, environments, and more. In The Last Grape, slice through your enemies with speed and precision in this action, fast paced platform where you control a ninja grape in seek for revenge. The Last Grape will be available on Steam.
